data.author: Ankit Pyasi

changelog.release_notes: 1.0 - Initial release.

data.description:
Boldy Texty
==========

"Incredibly simple yet simply functional!"

Boldy Texty is an all text watchface that is incredibly simple and highly legible. It just works! It has dark and light themes for you to chose from.

It features :

+ Date
+ Day and Month
+ Time
+ Battery status (charge percent/charging)
+ Temperature (Celsius/Fahrenheit configurable from settings)
+ Weather Condition
+ Steps taken today OR Connection status (configurable from settings)

It features offline settings which lets you :

+ Temperature unit
+ Show steps OR Connection Status
+ Theme (Light/Dark)
+ Toggle to vibrate every hour
+ Toggle to not vibrate during quiet hours (11 PM - 6 AM)
+ Toggle to vibrate when phone connects/disconnects.

Please ❤ Boldy Texty to support further development.

latest_release.release_notes: 1.0 - Initial release.

data.title: Boldy Texty

data.author: Xowap

changelog.release_notes:
Initial release

Features:
- Display the Internet time

data.description:
Displays the Internet Time!

Internet Time is a time standard invented by Swatch. The idea is to split days in 1000 slices that are ".beats". Those are time-zone independant, 0 happens at midnight GMT+1.

Screenshot displays @529.5, which is about 12:41 GMT+1.

(Please note that the decimal part is not included in the standard, but just displaying the .beat was boring)

latest_release.release_notes:
Initial release

Features:
- Display the Internet time

data.title: Beat It

data.author: Lignite

changelog.release_notes: Added "shake to show all (even time)" setting, so you can see every single pixel of your photos, no time on top! (Thanks for the suggestion, Nick)
Fixed trial period being really short on some watches. Sorry about that!
Fixed ugly trial screen on Pebble Time Round, sorry about that!

Fixed an issue on Android where users would not be able to access settings without logging in every time
Fixed photos not saving with "Save Changes" button. If you were affected by this issue, please go through each photo by clicking "Crop", saving, and the save changes button should work.
Fixed an issue where a blank page would load
Fixed a bug where regardless of your temperature setting it would always switch back to celsius. Sorry about that folks!
Last fix before actual release, hopefully? We're bug patching machines!
Fixed some JavaScript issues

Fixed island image on black and white platforms
Fixed JavaScript not working and settings not loading
Fixed issue with photo sending
Fixed some health values being off
Initial release!

data.description:
Younique is the most personalizable face ever made for Pebble.

Upload and display up to 6 photos from your phone. Customize modules that display health info, weather, bluetooth and more. 

Please note: This is a paid watchface. You will get the first 24 hours free.
---
Afterwards, you will have to pay either $1.99 for just the face or $5.99 for our lifetime bundle which includes every face we've ever made and will make.

data.description:
Uberwatch

(Time, Weather, Health)

+ TIME AND DAY
+ WEATHER TEMPERATURE AND CONDITION
+ STEP GOAL PROGRESS
+ BATTERY CHARGE
+ THEME: 16 themes, Random all/selected, Weather (theme depends on the weather condition)
+ STEPS GOAL: 5000, 10000, 15000, ...
+ NIGHT THEME: choose a theme to be used at night
+ TIME FORMAT (12h/24h, detected from Pebble settings)
+ DISCONNECT/RECONNECT VIBRATION (Yes, No)
+ HOURLY VIBRATION (Yes, No)
+ WEATHER LOCATION (Blank for auto detection, ZipCode,CountryCode for manual location)

Designed and developed by dPunisher, based on my design Overthewatch.
Check out dp-watchfaces.com

---
$1.01 via KiezelPay at 
www.kzl.io/uw

(24h Trial)

changelog.release_notes:
New Features with 2.1:
-On colored displays, each class now has its own unique color, which can be customized in the Pebble app on the phone
-The TJHSST Schedule can now be turned off from the settings page in the Pebble app on the phone

data.description:
Orbit is a simple watchface with the hands represented by bodies orbiting each other (the hour hand orbits the center, and the minute hand orbits the hour hand).  Version 2 includes getting the schedule for the current hour at Thomas Jefferson High School for Science and Technology (TJHSST) and displaying it around the Hour hand.

New with 2.1:     
-the user can now disable displaying the TJHSST Schedule from within the settings page in the Pebble phone app

-each class now has its own color, which can also be customized from the Pebble phone app

latest_release.release_notes:
New Features with 2.1:
-On colored displays, each class now has its own unique color, which can be customized in the Pebble app on the phone
-The TJHSST Schedule can now be turned off from the settings page in the Pebble app on the phone

data.title: Orbit 2.0 - TJHSST Schedule

Th 6 o'clock dial displays the running seconds.

data.author: Swarley

changelog.release_notes:
1.0:
First Release.


1.1:
*Added the ability to install this watchface on the og Pebble Time, Pebble Time Round and the upcoming Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.

#Note that thhere is a chance that this watchface won't not work properly on the Pebble Time Round and Time 2 because of their display's shape and size respectively.

* Changed the color of the background from black to red (only on the watches that support it, obviously).


1.2:
* Fixed a bug which caused the second digit of the minutes to show an empty square instead sometimes.

* Added a menu icon (in the watchfaces app).


1.3:
*Made this watchface my own (not the general idea of DIGITTMM but the code itself.)

* Changed the background's color once again, this time to Cobalt Blue.

*There's now no flick to show data (weather, bluetooth concetivity, etc.) but only the date under the hours. I changed this because a lot of people, including myself, use the flicking gesture to turn on the backlight, and when in the dark and you want to read the time, the data pops up and the backlight could turn of too soon for you to be able to read the time.

1.4:
*Added a vibration after your watch disconnects from your phone.

1.5:
*Also added an icon to show you that you are disconnected from your phone (bluetooth is off/disconnected).

data.description:
*****NEW VERSION*****
*****SEARCH FOR "Numbers To Letters - DIGITTMM Edition V2*****
******LINK:  goo.gl/axXqcH  *****


An analog watchface goes digital.


Hours are sitting in the center, while the minutes orbit them.

The time is written in letters instead of numbers:
ON is 1, TW is 2, TH is 3, etc.

The date will be shown under the hours.
Also, the watch will now vibrate and show an icon on screen when it will disconnect from your phone.

Be sure to leave a heart if you liked this watchface, will be much appreciated.
Also, please share your thoughts, tell me if you would like to see some changes, or if you are experiencing any kind of bugs.

latest_release.release_notes:
1.0:
First Release.


1.1:
*Added the ability to install this watchface on the og Pebble Time, Pebble Time Round and the upcoming Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.

#Note that thhere is a chance that this watchface won't not work properly on the Pebble Time Round and Time 2 because of their display's shape and size respectively.

* Changed the color of the background from black to red (only on the watches that support it, obviously).


1.2:
* Fixed a bug which caused the second digit of the minutes to show an empty square instead sometimes.

* Added a menu icon (in the watchfaces app).


1.3:
*Made this watchface my own (not the general idea of DIGITTMM but the code itself.)

* Changed the background's color once again, this time to Cobalt Blue.

*There's now no flick to show data (weather, bluetooth concetivity, etc.) but only the date under the hours. I changed this because a lot of people, including myself, use the flicking gesture to turn on the backlight, and when in the dark and you want to read the time, the data pops up and the backlight could turn of too soon for you to be able to read the time.

1.4:
*Added a vibration after your watch disconnects from your phone.

1.5:
*Also added an icon to show you that you are disconnected from your phone (bluetooth is off/disconnected).

data.title: Numbers To Letters - DIGITTMM

data.author: Parakoopa
data.description:
A watchface in the style of Pokémon Mystery Dungeon (PMD) Sky / Time / Darkness.

It features Time Gears from the game and comes with three backgrounds from the game.

Features (all can be customized):
* Displays time (I think this is pretty important).
* Shows date in month/day or day/month format.
* Displays weather and temperature (Fahrenheit or Celcius) using a forecast.io developer key.
* When your phone was disconnected, the Time Gear get's stolen (a black shadow appears in it's place).
* Your watch will also vibrate if the phone get's disconnected.
* HP bar as step counter with custom step goal.
* "Light" around the Time Gear represents battery level (each is 10%).

-------

Pokémon is owned by Nintendo and The Pokémon Company. This watchface is not affiliated with Nintendo or The Pokémon Company in any way. This is just fan made.
data.title: Time Gear

data.author: Sage Ross

changelog.release_notes:
1.4: Indicates Wikidata
  - When a result from Wikidata is shown, it says "(wikidata)" after the name.

1.3: Customizable time color, Wikidata fallback
  - You can choose the color of the time text in the settings.
  - If no unillustrated Wikipedia articles are found nearby, it will try a query on Wikidata instead.

1.2: Better handling of empty results
  - Now, if there are no results within range (about 5 km), it will say so.

1.1: New settings options!
  - Choose kilometers or miles for the units
  - Set the Wikipedia language version (from the 25 most-edited languages)

1.0:
  - First release! The core functionality works, but just for English Wikipedia so far.

data.description:
Diderot shows you the nearest unphotographed Wikipedia article to you, along with the distance and direction. You'll also get a notification whenever you're near an unphotographed location that is new to you.

Diderot uses the articles-by-lat-lon-without-images tool on wmflabs.org to find unphotographed articles. Only articles with .jpg images — not .png or .svg illustrations — count as illustrated, so you can photograph places that have only maps or diagrams.

Your location data updates every minute from your phone's geolocation.

latest_release.release_notes:
1.4: Indicates Wikidata
  - When a result from Wikidata is shown, it says "(wikidata)" after the name.

data.title: Diderot

data.description:
How is the sun feeling? 

Glance the current conditions through the sun's emotions!

Art and Icons are from Josh Maule's Emotisun. The design echoes the famous Sketch Weather. This watchface was created out of request from /u/Ruphies.

- Updates every 45 minutes
- Fixed or GPS location
- Black theme coming soon!

NOTE: Please allow up to a minute for watchface to update the weather. You may also press Save on the settings to force an update.

data.description:
This is a watchface version of Rosewright Chronograph.  Please install Rosewright Chronograph (listed among the apps) if you are looking for a functional chonograph watch.

Rosewright C is a watchface you can run for everyday use on your Pebble with the look of a fancy three-dial chronograph, but as it is a watchface and not an app, the start/stop buttons aren't functional and the chrono function is disabled.  However, it supports the normal Pebble functionality for a watchface (timeline view, health view, and so on).

If you install both Rosewright C and Rosewright Chronograph, you can assign Chronograph to a quick-launch button to effectively enable the chronograph functionality at a touch of the button.

latest_release.release_notes: Quiet time should stop the hourly buzzer

data.title: Rosewright C

data.description:
Now supports (Include setting page) - English, 中文, Español, Deutsch, Français, Italiano

Galaxy Stone is a premium watchface that include fantasy style and many new features.

The watchface includes the following features, all of which can be disabled/enabled as you please.

--The perfect combination of traditional and smart watch's advantages, see time is easy.
--Support Health Fitness Tracking for all pebble watch models, include pebble, pebble steel, pebble time, time steel, time round, pebble 2, pebble time 2 ...
--You can get weather by current location or specify city name in setting page.
--You can select different weather source, current include OpenWeatherMap, Yahoo Weather, Chinese Weather.
--Show three days weather forecast information only need shake your wrist.
--Battery level indicator
--Bluetooth disconnection and vibration
--Timing vibration by setting (hourly, 45/40/30 minutes)
--Not timing vibration time period support
--You can choose different color style
-- Show today Constellation

This is only a start, we will continue add new features soon!

Please click the heart if you like it! 

Thank you!

这款作品名叫“银河石”，她采用了独特的圆环和小球设计，分钟和秒钟的位置像机械手表一样变化，同时巧妙的加入了数字显示，让您对时间了然于胸！

能够同时显示日期、星座、今日天气、后3天天气、温度、空气质量、健康、蓝牙、电量等多种指数，同时可以对任意指数进行开关。

同时本作品对布局和表达方式都进行了新的尝试！

如果您喜欢请强烈点赞红星！

latest_release.release_notes: Add more Chinese festival days

data.description:
YR-353-2 is a multifunction digital watchface that aims to deliver all the info that you might need, at a glance, in a minimalistic approach.
 
The watchface is built to run on the Pebble Time, the Pebble Time Round and the upcoming Pebble 2, it supports the newly released Pebble OS 4 and Quick Views and has thousands of color combos that can suit any attire.

It features a clean battery bar, sleep times and steps taken in the last 24 hours, date, UTC time zone and current location and weather.

Weather data is updated every hour based on your location, it can be displayed in either Celsius or Fahrenheit, and it's retrieved from one of three providers: OpenWeatherMap, Weather Underground or Forecast.io

* Added UTC time

data.description:
Get fit and be active, improve your health and well being!
Set your daily step target, add some bots, and race them around the clock.
You can even challenge your friends and verse them in StepVerse, the great new step tracking watchface.

StepVerse has a one-time cost of $1.99 with a three day (72 hours) trial period, via KiezelPay. 
If you love StepVerse, don't forget to give it a ❤!

== Verse your Friends ==
- Easily compare your steps to your friends with the progress lines around the outside.
- Intelligent Timezone support, so you can challenge friends on the other side of the world.
- Notifications when you're winning, gain a place, or lose place, or hit your step target - so you know when you need to keep going and when you can relax.

== Verse the Bots ==
- Add any of the bots just like friends
- Step Target
- Your Average and StepVerse Average
- Fitness Trainer, and Extreme Fitness Trainer
- And more...

== Other features ==
- Steps are synced frequently, so always know who is in the lead.
- Companion website with full configuration, graphs and stats, including daily step totals for your friends for the last 2 weeks.
- Timeline Quick View supported

== Companion App: "StepVerse Friends" ==
- Free when you sign up for StepVerse
- Automatically syncs unobtrusively in the background, so you can keep using your favourite watchface.
- Lists all of your friends and their current step counts.

See: "More from this developer" below

StepVerse Sync API: https://api.stepverse.com

data.description:
Overwatch over the watch.

(Time, Weather, Health)

HUD description
----------------
SCORE: Time
LEVEL: Day
ULTIMATE PROGRESS(Q): Steps goal progress
HEALTH: Battery charge
ONFIRE: Temperature
FLAME: Weather condition
----------------

+ THEME: Set 1 of 22 heroes, Random all/selected, Weather (hero depends on the weather condition)
+ BACKGROUND: Auto (hero linked), Set 1 of 13 colors, Random all, Weather (color depends on weather condition)
+ STEPS GOAL: 5000, 10000, 15000, ...
+ NIGHT THEME: choose a theme (hero) to be used at night (set time zone for night period).
+ TIME FORMAT (12, 24) (Detected from Pebble watch settings)
+ TEMPERATURE UNIT (Celsius, Fahrenheit)
+ DISCONNECT/RECONNECT VIBRATION (Yes, No)
+ HOURLY VIBRATION (Yes, No)
+ WEATHER LOCATION (Blank for auto detection, ZipCode,CountryCode for manual location)

Designed and developed by dPunisher, inspired by Overwatch game from Blizzard.
Check out dp-watchfaces.com

---
$1.337 via KiezelPay at 
www.kzl.io/ow

(24h Trial)

Thanks for the awesome feedback and support!

data.author: Merlin

changelog.release_notes: Shake to activate the watch and all the text will show. This should help slightly more with battery. As there is less to render.

* Removed sunrise/sunset times
* Show icon for daytime/night time (sleepy face=night, smiley=day)
* Location is now cached until a update is requested (once per day)

* Fixed issue where the watch would request location for an hour every minute (from midnight to one in the morning)
* Location is now fetched on launch and at one minute past midnight.

* Small changes to the code
* Phone battery level and whether it is charging

* The watch face is now themed based on time of day.
* Black theme at night, colourful theme during the day.
* Also at night the watchface should consume slightly less battery as less interface sections are updating.

* Added sunrise and sunset calculation
* Gets GPS from phone
* hour radial had an error if the time was after midday

* Made the rings slightly thinner, they also now do not overlap
* Made the step ring, two separate rings (one for current steps, one for where you should be)
* Removed some calculations, so it should be slightly more efficient now.
* Added localization for the date strings

* Moved code around to make executable smaller.
* Seems to have sped up the face a little (hopefully will now use even less battery)
Updated some variables. Attempting to make the watchface more efficient.
Fixed spacing in the battery display
This is the initial release

data.description:
This watchface displays the following information:

* Current time
* Current date
* Current day
* Battery percentage
* Phone Battery Percentage
* Bluetooth connectivity
* Steps taken
* How many steps you should have taken by now
* Your average steps and percentage for the day

This watchface changes depending on whether it is day time or night time. At night it is white text on black, and during the day it is black on white. Also all the circles at the back get removed during the night.

To activate the text on the outside shake your arm, and after 10 seconds the text will hide.

The rings from the centre are:

1. How far you are from your current average (centre is perfect, to the left is behind and to the right is ahead)
2. Hour hand (using a classic 12 hour time
3. Minute hand
4. Steps taken as a percentage of your average steps
5. What your step count should be

The entire background changes to red when the bluetooth connection is lost.

The values:
Top:
* Left: date with day below
* Right: battery percentage, with phone battery below

Bottom:
* Left: current steps, with what you should have done by now above
* Right: percentage of your average, with the daily average above

There is some more information at the website link (below) which describes the various sections of the app in greater detail. And where I would like to take this watchface.

If anyone has ideas to improve this watchface (that are not listed in the website listed below) then please send them to me. I would be more than happy to try out some ideas, and new things.

latest_release.release_notes: Shake to activate the watch and all the text will show. This should help slightly more with battery. As there is less to render.

data.description:
Dashboard
=========

Dashboard is a super easy to read watchface that you can customize to your liking.
It shows you all the info you need in a clutter free and yet feature rich interface.

The face shows you :
+ Time (obviously!) in 12h/24h format
+ Day and date (TUE, 06 SEP)
+ Battery charge and state
+ Steps taken for the day
+ Progress Meters (hence called Dashboard!) for -
     . Steps taken for the day (against Daily Step Goals)
     . Battery percent left (against total 100%)

Apart from above you can customize the watchafce to configure :
+ Daily Step Goal (1000-15000)
+ Background Color
+ Text Color
+ Meter Progress Color
+ Toggle for Hourly Vibration
+ Toggle to respect quiet hours
+ Toggle for BT Connection Vibrations
+ Toggle for Battery Meter Color As Per Charge Left

Don't forget to ❤ if you like this watchface to support and encourage the developer.

Dashboard is free for now, but will soon be paid. 
Enjoy!

data.description:
Supports  Pebble versions from Pebble 2 (Diorite) to Aplite with quick view support.

 * Handles Quick Event view
 * Display time, updating once per minute
 * 12/14 hour display
 * Date
 * Display Battery power
 * Display notice when Bluetooth is disconnected
 * Optional vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect (default is do not vibrate)
 * Configurable Foreground (hour/date/etc. text) color
 * Configurable Background color
 * Configurable Minutes color
 * Configurable display hours or minutes as digits

Uses watchface framework https://github.com/clach04/watchface_framework/.

data.description:
Implemented by Douwe Maan. 
Slightly modified by Christophe Jeannette in order to add :

Slicker animations
Battery instead of the seconds (Battery friendly)
Two automatic languages : English and French
BT disconnection vibration

Envisioned as a watchface by Jean-Noël Mattern (Jnm), who posted it in the "Watch-face ideas" thread on the Pebble forums.

Based on the display of the Freebox Revolution, which was designed by Philippe Starck.

data.author: J03bot

changelog.release_notes:
V1.0:
Fixed redundant text/image layer generation

data.description:
A watchface for the pebble and pebble time.

Choose your pokemon from the configuration screen, and watch it evolve as your battery discharges! (Each evolution covers about 1/3 of the battery life, with the level equal to half of the consumed battery)

Your opponent also evolves based on time, watch charge, and connection status.

latest_release.release_notes:
V1.0:
Fixed redundant text/image layer generation

data.title: Pokemon: Eevee appeared!

data.author: Prakash

changelog.release_notes: Fixed weather not updating for some people.

Added support for Pebble Time 2.
Added Donate button.
Changed font of Health Info to bold again  for better visibility
Changing font of Health Info when timeline quick view is visible

Added option for Disabling weather
Showing all health data when Timeline Quick view is visible
Fixed incorrect reading for miles
A most stable release.
Hotfix for previous release

Added option for custom location
Added option for realtime health data update

Optimized battery performance
Set 10 Minutes as default transition time

A completely re-written code which provides complete customization of your watch.
Supported OS now includes classic pebble and Pebble 2
Battery optimizations - All animations will stop while sleeping

Fixed silly mistake :| 
Slider for setting interval for automatic changing of layers should be disabled if auto changing is disabled
Memory optimizations

- Showing slider for setting update intervals in user preference
- bluetooth optimizations
Fixed : Health info was not getting updated if layers are set to be update after long interval
Optimized layout for 4.0, kilometers are shown as 'x.xx' instead of 'x.xxx'
Fixed : Weather data was getting reloaded whenever navigating away from home screen and then back
Reduced app size, fixed issue where screen was getting defaulted to "Calories Screen" on first load

A watchface with complete pebble health at a glance.

Featurues :
1. Configurable Time format
2. Configurable Date format
3. Show/Hide Day of week
4. Configurable Bluetooth Connect/Disconnect vibration
5. Weather in Celsius or Fahrenheit
6. Battery meter
7. Step Count and distance walked
8. Sleep time and deep sleep percentage
9. Calories burned

All these features completely free for you !

Feel free to give it a heart if you like my work :)

Worth to mention here is the watchface which inspired me to create one : HealthView

data.description:
A watchface with complete pebble health at a glance.

Featurues :
1. Configurable Time format
2. Configurable Date format
3. Show/Hide Day of week
4. Configurable Bluetooth Connect/Disconnect vibration
5. Weather in Celsius or Fahrenheit
6. Battery meter
7. Step Count and distance walked
8. Sleep time and deep sleep percentage
9. Calories burned
10. Configurable Colours
11. Pebble quick view support
All these features completely free for you !

Please give a heart if you like my work :)

Worth to mention here is the watchface which inspired me to create one : HealthView

NOTE 1 : If due to no internet connectivity in phone or any other reason the weather was not updated successfully, then instead of temperature only the text "pebble" is shown. So don't freak out !

NOTE 2 : This watchface has been tested on emulator for pebble classic, pebble 2 and pebble time 2 so please mail me in case you find any issues.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed weather not updating for some people.

data.title: Healthify

data.author: Ginger Theology

changelog.release_notes: You can now customize all of the battery bar colors! Choose the battery bar foreground and background independently from the text and window background colors. Also, change what colors the battery bar turns when your battery is below 20% and below 10%.
Fixed an issue where Trinity color data was not being stored. All color data should now be persistent.

*Color Customization: Choose from 64 colors for your background and foreground (on color Pebble smartwatches)!
*Easier to read battery indicator.

Updated to Pebble SDK 4.0!
*Battery indicator.
*Battery indicator changes colors as battery gets low.
*Oxford Blue background (User-chosen backgrounds coming soon!).
*Support for all Pebble smartwatches running 4.x!

data.description:
An easy-to-read watchface that displays the Trinity symbol.
Features:
*Color customization
*Battery indicator

latest_release.release_notes: You can now customize all of the battery bar colors! Choose the battery bar foreground and background independently from the text and window background colors. Also, change what colors the battery bar turns when your battery is below 20% and below 10%.

data.title: Trinity

data.author: David Morgan

changelog.release_notes:
- Seconds support. Now you can have seconds shown. Note that battery life will be impacted if you enable this option.
- Configurable date format.
- Bug fixes.
Remove sleep info. Unfortunately a Pebble firmware bug causes the watchface to get "stuck" showing sleep instead of steps.
Fix some spacing issues
Show quiet time indicator on supported platforms.

* Rewritten from the ground-up to support Time 2!
* Switch font to Gilroy
* Fix Yahoo! weather bugs
* Larger time on Pebble OG

* Color configuration on Pebble Time. Want black on red? Go for it.
* Color invert on Pebble and Pebble 2.

* Larger time!
* Display typical steps on Pebble 2
Fix a GPS location bug.
Fix manual location setting.

- Use "feels like" temperature for Forecast.io and Weather Underground
- Dial back wake up timeout to 2 minutes
- Show tenths of a mile when under 10 miles

Version 1.2.0
========

- Sleep status. When you wake up the step count will be replaced with a sleep duration. After 10 minutes the step count will come back.
- Delegate distance unit preference to system preference.
- Fix some layout related bugs.

Version 1.1.0
========

- Match up step count bar with health view on PT.
- Pixel pushing tweaks for timeline quick view.

Version 1.0.0
========

Initial release. Yay!

data.description:
Workaday is a simple and functional watchface. It includes all the complications you would expect:

* Date
* Time
* Battery level
* Connection indicator
* Weather
* Step count

Workaday strives to be simple to read, with the time large and center. Additional information can be temporarily shown by quickly rotating your wrist.

Master Key (https://www.pmkey.xyz) is supported for weather API keys.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Seconds support. Now you can have seconds shown. Note that battery life will be impacted if you enable this option.
- Configurable date format.
- Bug fixes.

data.author: yoosee

changelog.release_notes: Fixed retry logic when weather.gov failed (particularly outside of US) to openweather.org.

Weather logic changed to cache data for 10 minutes. Weather provider default Weather.gov then fallback to OpenWeatherMap.org.
Text adjustments.
Added build for Diorite Pebble 2.
Minor updates.

data.description:
Digital Watchface with Time, Date, Current temperature, Weather condition and Health Steps, Bluetooth disconnect indicator. All colors are configurable.

Your Pebble has to be updated to v4.0 firmware due to SDK4 restriction.

Because of Weather provider inaccuracy, now it uses Weather.gov as a default provider, then try OpenWeatherMap.org for fallback. Data cached for 10 minutes, and automatically updated in every 30 minutes.

Please try "Obsidian" watchface if you're looking for Analog watch with similar functions.
data.title: Zirconia

data.author: Pebblestyle.com

changelog.release_notes: New Top Display Options: Steps without Sleep Switch, Steps with Goals without Sleep Switch
PTR UI improvements, "Big Time" readability improvement, NPM Libraries Updates

ADDED Option: Display Date on Bottom instead of weather
ADDED Option: Display Temperatures on Bottom
ADDED Option: Display Phone Battery in Percent while charging (Android)
ADDED Option: Display Pebble Battery State charging
ADDED Option: Display steps with step goal on top
Display both Battery lines for Pebble Battery on iOS
Fixed Location ADDED, Option to disable Weather Update on tap ADDED, Settings Page Useability optimized
Forecast.io changed to Dark Sky API, Package Updates: Kiezelpay & Pebble Health
FIXED weather api with Fahrenheit for yahoo and openweathermap

BUGFIX Time Font loading after switching from Big Time to Regular Inline
ADDED Weather Update Interval
Also memory optimisations.
Kiezelpay Bugfixes

ADDED BigTime Option
FIXED disappearing Date Display
OPTIMIZED Pebble 4.0 Timeline Quick Preview 
ADDED hide/show Battery Lines options
OPTIMIZED chalk elements positions
OPTIMIZED health events (not call health functions, if date is selected)
and other minor bugfixes

NEW: Vibration on Disconnect Option
NEW: Masterkey Support to fetch all your Weather API keys at once
NEW: End Trial/Buy now Option for Kiezelpay

Settings Bug FIXED: If all settings were filled they couldn't be saved and applied.
NEW Weather Provider: wunderground.com (supports all condition languages)
Kiezelpay (double payments) fix
Steps/Sleep Switch fixed

Added Celsius/Fahrenheit Temperature Switch.
Added Yahoo Weather (no API Key needed, no multilang support).
Added Forecast.io (API Key needed, multilang support).
Updated dependencies for Pebble 4.0
Initial Release

data.description:
Clean and Clear Dotfont Watchface.
First Watchface by www.pebblestyle.com 
[ @pebblestyle on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook & Pinterest ]

Just 99ct + local taxes via Kiezelpay. 24 hours trial. Option buy now.

Features:
- Dotfont Time / BigTime
- Health Data: Steps/Sleep Switch, Step Goal
- Date
- Weather with condition translations (4 Providers)
- Battery Lines for your Pebble
- Battery Line for your Phone (Android only)
- Charging State for Pebble
- Charging State for Phone (Android only)
- Custom Colors & Options
- Bluetooth disconnect alert
- Optimized for Pebble 4.x

Displays the Time in centered Dotfont or BigTime Option with pebble battery lines. If you're on Android, it shows a line of your phone battery above the time. Battery Lines can be hidden.

On top it shows current Pebble Health Data, it shows steps and switches to sleep, if sleep is detected. It shows your phone charging state on Android. Or you can show the date.

The bottom line shows the weather via OpenWeatherMap, Dark Sky, Wunderground or Yahoo Weather. Supported weather languages (not Yahoo): English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Polish, Finnish, Dutch and Swedish. You can set temperature units Celsius or Fahrenheit. Choose GPS or fixed location. Or show the date.

"MasterKey" Support to fetch all your Weather API key at once via https://www.pmkey.xyz

Colors of the background, the time and the top/bottom line are customizable as well as many other things.

latest_release.release_notes: New Top Display Options: Steps without Sleep Switch, Steps with Goals without Sleep Switch

data.title: DotStyle
